summary: Completed E2E testing of admin dashboard CRUD operations and live page synchronization. All core features working correctly - admin login, create/edit/delete posts, and changes reflect on live pages (/flagship-contents). Data is MOCKED using localStorage.

issues: Default post 'Introduction to Faith by Experiments' has placeholder content 'Full content here...' which shows in the preview section

action_items: Add data-testid attributes to interactive elements for better testability
Update default post content in AdminDashboardPage.jsx - the 'Introduction to Faith by Experiments' post has placeholder content 'Full content here...' instead of actual content
critical_code_review_comments: Missing data-testid attributes on all interactive elements (buttons, forms, links) - affects automated testing
Default post in AdminDashboardPage.jsx line 29 has placeholder content 'Full content here...' which displays on homepage
seed_data_creation: Test posts created during testing are stored in localStorage under key 'flagshipPosts'
context_for_next_testing_agent: All CRUD operations tested and working. localStorage is used for all data storage. Admin login works from both /admin/login and /subscribe (Sign In tab). Posts created in admin dashboard appear on /flagship-contents page. Homepage shows first post from localStorage in Flagship Preview section.

tests_executed.admin_login_direct: PASS - Login via /admin/login with admin@faithbyexperiments.com / admin123
tests_executed.admin_login_subscribe: PASS - Login via /subscribe page Sign In tab redirects admin to dashboard
tests_executed.create_post: PASS - New posts created in admin dashboard are saved to localStorage
tests_executed.post_appears_on_flagship_contents: PASS - Created posts appear on /flagship-contents page
tests_executed.edit_post: PASS - Edited posts update in localStorage and reflect on live pages
tests_executed.delete_post: PASS - Deleted posts are removed from localStorage and all live pages
tests_executed.homepage_flagship_preview: PASS - Shows first post from localStorage (title and content preview)

mocked_data_note: ALL DATA IS MOCKED using browser localStorage. No backend API calls. Posts stored under 'flagshipPosts' key, admin session under 'admin' key.
